content: {"id": "1ee2839c-521e-4007-b5da-3e03b302ed57", "name": "Food4Life Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Resurrection Lutheran Church's (RLC) Food4Life pantry has been going strong since 2009, serving the greater Leyden Township and surrounding areas. RLC is a constant presence and stability for many during difficult economic times, but we don\u2019t do it alone! Schools, support groups, churches, businesses, civic organizations, local libraries, and residents \u2013 beside our own members \u2013 support RLC pantry. We serve approximately 300 guests per month. We are open on Mondays, including most holidays.Anyone in need is welcome to visit us once a month. Those who would like to donate food can call the office or send an email for more information. If you would like to donate money to support our food pantry, you can visit our website at www.rlcfp.org.
